meanings: [동사] vent one's anger (on), take sth out on, take one's anger out on
vent one´s anger on one´s innocent sister
감정 Don't take it out on me.
감정 Picking on me won't help.
Verb vent one's anger on, take out on

meanings.meaning: visit one's indignation[blunder] on[upon] a person

vlive.korean: [그리고 뿔나신 동운님의 화풀이 타임] 자! [And it's time for Dongwoon to relieve his anger] Now! 듣기 View video 그래TV : 레플:하이라이트-ep17. 이게 바로! 다크라이트 찬스!!
vlive.english: [And it's time for Dongwoon to relieve his anger] Now!

vlive.korean: 넌 도대체 뭘 잘했다고 재혁이한테까지 화풀이야? Why are you made at Jaehyuk? What did you do well to do that? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : [연애포차 시즌1] - EP.08 경제관념 달라서 썸 깨지는 순간
vlive.english: Why are you made at Jaehyuk? What did you do well to do that?

vlive.korean: 이사 앞에선 한 마디도 못하면서 왜 우리한테 화풀이야? 그지? He can't say anything to the director, but he always lets it out on us, right? 듣기 View video 상사세끼 시즌2 : 감정 기복이 롤러코스터급, 조현민 뺨치는 막말 폭언 레전드 과장 [상사세끼2/상사삼끼2] E
vlive.english: He can't say anything to the director, but he always lets it out on us, right?

vlive.korean: 이거는 약간 화풀이에요. I think she was putting her anger on it. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : WANNA.B - 워너비 '긴장백배 복불복특집'
vlive.english: I think she was putting her anger on it.

vlive.korean: 화풀이를 이런 식으로 하는구나. This is how he vents his anger out on me. 듣기 View video INFINITE : 안녕?
vlive.english: This is how he vents his anger out on me.

examples.korean: Don’t shoot the messenger! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 엉뚱한 사람한테 화풀이 하지 마! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t shoot the messenger! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: OK, so you had a bad day. Don’t take it out on me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 좋아, 그러니까 자네 오늘 일진이 안 좋았구먼. 그걸 나한테 화풀이 하진 마. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: OK, so you had a bad day. Don’t take it out on me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Look, I know you had a bad day at work, but don’t take it out on me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 야, 너 회사에서 일진이 안 좋았던 건 알겠는데, 나한테 화풀이하지 마. DARAKWON
examples.english: Look, I know you had a bad day at work, but don’t take it out on me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He vented[took out] his anger on me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 나를 화풀이 상대로 삼았다 Neungyule
examples.english: He vented[took out] his anger on me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He wreaked his anger on his brother. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 동생에게 화풀이를 했다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
